thread.title: American Couple Among Killed and Wounded in London Terror Attack
thread.title_full: American Couple Among Killed and Wounded in London Terror Attack

author: Justin Holcomb
title: American Couple Among Killed and Wounded in London Terror Attack
text:
American Couple Among Killed and Wounded in London Terror Attack Share Share Tweet 
An American man was killed and his wife was injured as a result of the deadly attacks in London Wednesday that left numerous people dead and at least 40 injured. 
According to Utah news outlet KSL , Kurt Cochran was one of the victims killed in the incident and his wife, Melissa, was injured. Melissa's parents are currently serving as LDS missionaries in London. The couple was expected to fly back to Utah on Thursday. 
British police forces arrested eight people and conducted six raids in connection with attack. The Latest: A Morman church official says a Utah man was killed, wife seriously wounded in the London attack. https://t.co/FmOLasl852
